page.title: 16The Square,Shrub End.
page.content: {The Square}forms a focal point for many people in Shrub End, being a meeting place as well as a shopping area. The chip called "John's fish bar" was built 30 years ago. People from schools go there at lunch time. At night skin heads meet by the square to glue sniff and smoke. The shops are used by local people for shopping. The Co-op was opened on October 22 1956 and has since been enlarged. It was the first self service shop in Colchester and used to deliver. Lavell's run a good newsagent's shop in the square. Recently, the Square was improved, and a car park was created.
